document_data.mainbody:
The Everlight Theatre was a theater in Elturel.
The playhouse put on performances from bardic troupes such as the Sharptongue Travelling Troupe. The Everlight Theatre hosted Cagon Feggs great play, The Folly and the Fall, which was shown for one season only.
The theatre was said to have erupted into chaos after The Folly and the Fall was performed.
